Quick search

GeoWombat: geo-utilities for overhead air- and space-borne imagery¶

Like a wombat, GeoWombat has a simple interface with a strong backend.

GeoWombat is designed to provide specialized “geo-functionality” to Xarray and Dask data, using Rasterio for raster I/O. The package is inspired by, and built on, several key libraries for large-scale data processing, such as:

  • Xarray

  • Dask

  • Rasterio

  • Pandas

  • Geopandas
